section.heading: Tax on unincorporated businesses — Transfer of surtax to Convention Center Authority.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 331, ch. 258, art. I, title VIII, § 3a

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Washington Convention Center Authority, collection and allocation of taxes under this section, see § 10-1203.07.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Expiration of §§ 301, 302 and 303 of D.C. Law 10-188: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1807.02a.
Audit of accounts and operation of Authority: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1807.02a.
